List of development projects funded by CIDA

## Details
The Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) is Canada's lead agency for development assistance.
CIDA was established in 1968 to administer the bulk of Canada's official development assistance (ODA) program.
The Project Browser contains more than 2,400 profiles of projects funded by the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA).
CIDA is progressively publishing all of its operational projects in the Project Browser. The Project Browser does not yet contain all projects from all CIDA programs.

extras.value: Go to Project Browser. Select 'advanced search' for more search criteria. Pre-compiled lists of project on the left hand bar.

The Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) is Canada's lead agency for development assistance.
CIDA was established in 1968 to administer the bulk of Canada's official development assistance (ODA) program.
The Project Browser contains more than 2,400 profiles of projects funded by the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA).
CIDA is progressively publishing all of its operational projects in the Project Browser. The Project Browser does not yet contain all projects from all CIDA programs.

The materials available on this site are covered by the provisions of the Copyright Act (, Canadian acts, regulations, and policies, and international agreements. Such provisions allow the reproduction of any work for private study or research, or review, criticism, or reporting, as long as the source is identified. Such provisions also allow any rights holder in a work to authorize its reproduction.
Reproduction of multiple copies of materials on this site, in whole or in part, for commercial redistribution, is prohibited except with written permission from the Government of Canada's copyright administrator, Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
